name: xorneg1

stmt.origin: bitri(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)), wxo(w1, wn(w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wxo(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wxo(w1, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))

|- wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))

stmt.origin: xchbinx(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wxo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, wn(w0)), wn(wxo(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wxo(w0, w1))

|- wb(wxo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wxo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wxo(w0, w1))

comment: The connector ` \/_ ` is negated under negation of one argument. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Jun-2020.)
